I have no idea what you are talking about, angels? pins?! Anyway, applying =
earth's physical sciences to attempt to explain=A0a phenomenon that has sho=
wn no evidence of=A0roots in the physical is an exercise in futility and po=
intless.

Regards,

Frank R.




________________________________
From: "th=
readsintyme@..." <Threadsintyme@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com

Sent: Thursday, November 13, 2008 1:16:15 PM
Subject: Re: Re : [EVP-ITC] Pr=
oofs for spirit world?


Hmmm...interesting thought!
The same reasoning tha=
t Koening has is "how many angels can dance on the head of a pin?" That wen=
t back to the medieval times...they argued endlessly to no avail. 
I never =
said that a spirit *has* to be inside a microwave! I merely thought that it=
 would/could be an interesting experiment. 
Al

-- Frank Ratka <warrior18ei=
i@ yahoo.com> wrote:

This debate is getting boring! You are both members o=
f=A0this ITC/EVP group and neither of you have thought to ask the very bein=
gs you are arguing about.

Regards,

Frank R.




_________________________=

roups .com
Sent: Thursday, November 13, 2008 8:08:21 AM
Subject: Re: Re : [=

Well AL 

I don't claim to have all the=
 answers. In my world "I don't have to be right."

If you have all of the a=
nswers "For Sure" then thanks for sharing. It will save me a lot of critica=
l thinking.

Otherwise I will continue to use the Scientific methods of rea=
son and observation.


On Thu, Nov 13, 2008 at 7:58 AM, threadsintyme@ juno=
.com <Threadsintyme@ juno.com> wrote:

Why is it so difficult for you to be=
lieve that Spirits are not able to move between dimensions, walk through so=
lid walls, doors, etc? If a spirits can move between dimensions walking thr=
ough a solid core door would be simple! 
What is your proof? I have seen sp=
irits go straight through solid core doors. Walls, etc.
What do YOU know fo=
r sure about the spirit world, David Koenig? 
Al

-- "David Koenig" <florid=
ajakeblues@ gmail.com> wrote:

There are a few things that I can do as a Hu=
man.... But I Can't fit into a microwave oven. What would make you think th=
at a Spirit could... or Would? Is that covered in Spirit 101 somewhere and =
I missed it? 
Some Spirits can tell the future. Others can't. Some don't ev=
en know they've passed on. Others do.
I'd like to hear everyones expertise =
in the Spirit World.
What do you know for sure?


On Wed, Nov 12, 2008 at 1=
0:59 PM, Zack Widup <w9sz@prairienet. org> wrote:


Well, that always bring=
s up the question - why couldn't they?


Zack
